location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 42 of 1822 from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, at Sheraz [Shiraz] to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the Arabic translation of the recently drafted Treaty of Mocka [Al-MukhƒÅ], which the Resident considers to have substantially deviated from the English original. It suggests that the Resident at Mocka should be able to render an acceptable translation, but notes that the Resident is willing to travel to Mocka to provide one himself if deemed necessary.
